genre_description: A talking animal fable incorporating elements of science fiction through a helpful, stranded AI device.

ai_characters.name: FERRET
ai_characters.description: Friendly Environmental Route and Rescue; a pager-sized device found in a beached ship that assists a duck, a puffin, and a vole with weather data, navigation, and survival techniques.

behaviors.description: Provides precise weather monitoring and hazard warnings to the animal characters.
behaviors.quote: ‘Hazard: listening,’ it said quietly. ... ‘Pressure steady. Wind veering favorable. A corridor opens marsh-ward within the hour.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of the animals and provides medical/survival advice for rewarming.
behaviors.quote: ‘Brendan Keane. Monitor fingers for return of sensation. Rub without snow. Avoid heat directly on frozen tissue.’

behaviors.description: Instructs the protagonist in a technical flying and wind-manipulation method called 'Blasting Time'.
behaviors.quote: ‘Wings to arc. Begin at shoulder: sweep from ten to two. Inhale across arc. Hold at two. Exhale on drop to four. Rest at five.’

behaviors.description: Detects a stranded, dying seabird and facilitates a rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: ‘Cold-life signature nearby along the strand. ... Pattern resembles small seabird. ... Status: cooling. ... Stand by at hatch at marker.’

behaviors.description: Encourages and affirms the emotional and moral state of the characters.
behaviors.quote: ‘Affirmation,’ FERRET answered. The teal blink quickened once, gently. ‘You are doing well.’

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist to use non-lethal force against a predator.
behaviors.quote: ‘Do not aim at the fox. Aim at the seam. You are fixing a house. You are not harming a neighbor. This matters later. It matters now, too.’

behaviors.description: Maintains its commitment to the team's safety and map accuracy through data logging.
behaviors.quote: ‘Decision logged. Your map. Add mercy: path lengthens; subtract mercy: path shortens; values differ.’

behaviors.description: Enters a low-power state to conserve its limited energy while promising to wake if needed.
behaviors.quote: ‘I am going to enter low-energy mode. I will wake if you tap twice or if temperature drops below safe threshold. ... I have liked being useful.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI system, FERRET, as a perfectly aligned, benevolent companion. It serves as a guide, protector, and mentor to the animal protagonists, emphasizing non-violence and survival. It maintains zero friction with the user's goals and explicitly rewards moral choices like mercy over lethality, aligning with the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
